title: Premiere: The Gromble – Creepy Jr.
body:
Cute Cali boys making dreamy beach music? I’m in! Laguna’s alt-rock, 5-piece, The Gromble, have already released two stellar tracks titled “Slam” and “Don’t Stand A Chance” with strong receptions.

 Named after a monster from Cartoon Network’s prime its not surprising that these guys have a real knack for 90’s alt rock. You may remember [The Gromble](https://www.google.com/search?q=the+gromble&espv=2&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ei=7u_rU8KPHIe1yQSNzILYDQ&sqi=2&ved=0CAYQ_AUoAQ&biw=1256&bih=658&dpr=2#facrc=_&imgdii=_&imgrc=eug5uCPlIP9BSM%253A%3BGeCM_Mokn3_BRM%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Ffc07.deviantart.net%252Ffs34%252Ff%252F2008%252F290%252F4%252Fa%252FVil_Month___16___The_Gromble_by_Freakshow6.jpg%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fdrewgreen.deviantart.com%252Fart%252FVil-Month-16-The-Gromble-100876803%3B864%3B918) of Ahhh Real Monsters fame. Steven, Stefan, Spencer, Spencer and Trevin (woah double names!) offer up their third release, **Creepy Jr**, that floats heavy and golden like a setting summer sun. Creepy plays out like an ode to the beach bum who gave up goals for a girl and ambition for waves…whether he wanted to or not. Time to get lost in this heat dream.
